creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: male figure with long, striped pants standing with legs wide apart; PL hand in pocket, object in PR hand; drum on ground at feet
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, and Seals

top: [Beating the drum and dancing / I travel the world alone; / In this life / I enjoy myself greatly / And never worry about money!] (SA)
markings: L edge ULQ; center R edge
title: Manzai Dancer
